title: How-To: Pass a groupBy() result to timechart()
description:
Illustrates how to take grouped results and feed them into timechart() to see how
aggregated metrics evolve over time.

examples.name: Group by UserName, then chart counts over time
examples.description: Groups first by UserName, then builds a timechart per user.
examples.query:
#event_simpleName=UserLogon
| groupBy(UserName, function=count() as loginCount)
| timechart(function=sum(loginCount), groupBy=UserName, span=1h)
